MaskedVictim1.synopsis: A victim of the hag, forced to wear a mask that takes away her free will so that she fights for and serves the hag. If the hag is killed, this character regains her senses and resolve. She's deeply shaken by her experience, but courageous, telling the player that she'll inform the people of Baldur's Gate of our heroism, and vowing to hunt down the hag's accomplices in the city.

AD_ControlledByMask.synopsis: The player has failed the wisdom save while wearing the mask - and fallen prey to the hag's control. Auntie Ethel takes over your mind.

Lair.synopsis: These are fired at the very beginning of the fight with the hag - tense scene. Hag is at one end of the cavern. Mayrina is trapped in a cage in the middle. Player is on the other side.
Lair.how_to_trigger: goto -305 587 skip through hag intro dialoguegoto -387 561 walk into lair - dialogue should start

PAD_FreedFromControl.synopsis: Player breaks free from the hag's control.

MaskedVictim1_AD_Resist.synopsis: Lines that play in combat when the hag's masked victim resists the commands of the mask.

MaskedVictim4.synopsis: A victim of the hag, bound into her service for so long that their mind is almost completely lost. This one is wearing the Mask of Servitude and is brainwashed to serve the hag and her 'visitors'.
MaskedVictim4.how_to_trigger: - In ReCon, type these:(ClearGlobalOsirisFlag HAG_Hag_SummonedVictims) (SetGlobalOsirisFlag HAG_Hag_State_IsDead)- goto -326.88, 16.05, 561.47- speak to the Mask of Terror

AD_WearMask.synopsis: This occurs when the player puts on the hag mask and on ever subsequent 'turn' thereafter. The player must continually succeed on a wisdom save or risk the hag taking over their mind.

MaskedVictim1_AD_FailResist.synopsis: Responding to a telephatic command from the hag's mask to kill the player.

MaskedVictim2_AD_Resist.synopsis: Lines that play in combat when the hag's masked victim resists the commands of the mask.

MaskedVictim2.synopsis: A victim of the hag, bound into her service for so long that their mind is almost completely lost. This victim is wearing the Mask of Terror, which fills them with fear of everything but the hag.

MaskedVictim4_AD_Resist.synopsis: Lines that play in combat when the hag's masked victim resists the commands of the mask.

MaskedVictim3.synopsis: A victim of the hag, bound into her service for so long that their mind is almost completely lost. This one is wearing the Mask of Vengeance, and is brainwashed to take revenge on anyone who hurts the hag.

AD_PutOnMask.synopsis: Player has put on the mask and looks around - relaising they can see things different (it allows them to bypass several illusions and traps within the hag's lair). However, the hag will attempt to break into their mind.

MaskedVictim3_AD_Resist.synopsis: Lines that play in combat when the hag's masked victim resists the commands of the mask.

MaskedVictim1_9.speaker: Mask of Regret
MaskedVictim1_9.text: As soon as my head's clear, I'm heading back to Baldur's Gate to finish this.
MaskedVictim1_9.context: NodeContext: still slightly shaky, but with resolve

MaskedVictim1_17.speaker: Mask of Regret
MaskedVictim1_17.text: I think the danger's passed, but my head's still spinning. I'll leave when I'm steadier on my feet.

MaskedVictim1_2.speaker: Player
MaskedVictim1_2.text: Take whatever time you need - the hag's not coming back.

MaskedVictim1_19.speaker: Mask of Regret
MaskedVictim1_19.text: We need to leave. You're not supposed to be here - she'll be furious.
MaskedVictim1_19.context: CinematicNodeContext: panicked, confused, as if coming out of a stuporNodeContext: confused, afraid

MaskedVictim1_33.speaker: Mask of Regret
MaskedVictim1_33.text: I thought I was lost... could feel my mind slipping away.
MaskedVictim1_33.context: NodeContext: still confused, but regaining her resolve

MaskedVictim1_11.speaker: Player
MaskedVictim1_11.text: Pull yourself together - the hag's dead. I made sure of it.

MaskedVictim1_14.speaker: Mask of Regret
MaskedVictim1_14.text: You're right. I don't feel her anymore... she's really gone.
MaskedVictim1_14.context: NodeContext: still confused, but regaining her resolve

MaskedVictim1_34.speaker: Mask of Regret
MaskedVictim1_34.text: If it weren't for you, I would have ended up like the others. Hollowed out and as good as dead.

MaskedVictim1_6.speaker: Player
MaskedVictim1_6.text: How did you end up here?

MaskedVictim1_27.speaker: Mask of Regret
MaskedVictim1_27.text: Sheer desperation. My mother's mind is gone... she's forgotten herself. I tried medicine, magic, prayer.
MaskedVictim1_27.context: NodeContext: 'sheer desperation' is her response to how she ended up dealing with a hag. regret as she tells the story

MaskedVictim1_23.speaker: Mask of Regret
MaskedVictim1_23.text: I'd have begged Myrkul himself if I thought he'd listen.
MaskedVictim1_23.context: NodeContext: regret, MER-kul is the god of the dead - turning to him would be a desperate act

MaskedVictim1_16.speaker: Mask of Regret
MaskedVictim1_16.text: Heard about this wise woman out in the back-end of nowhere who could help. I knew it was too good to be true. But I didn't care.
MaskedVictim1_16.context: NodeContext: explaining a mistake with regret

MaskedVictim1_25.speaker: Player
MaskedVictim1_25.text: Where will you go now that you're free?

MaskedVictim1_3.speaker: Mask of Regret
MaskedVictim1_3.text: Home, to Baldur's Gate. This isn't over yet.
MaskedVictim1_3.context: NodeContext: Home - pause - to Baldur's Gate. Then strong resolve and grit on 'this isn't over yet'.

MaskedVictim1_29.speaker: Player
MaskedVictim1_29.text: That warrants a reward, wouldn't you say?

MaskedVictim1_32.speaker: Mask of Regret
MaskedVictim1_32.text: The hag took everything except my life. Gratitude's all I can offer for now.
MaskedVictim1_32.context: NodeContext: apologetically, we just asked for a reward and she has none to give

MaskedVictim1_18.speaker: Mask of Regret
MaskedVictim1_18.text: But she's been luring victims here for years - plenty of other folk will be grateful too. I'll make sure they know your name.

MaskedVictim1_1.speaker: Player
MaskedVictim1_1.text: What do you mean 'this isn't over'?

MaskedVictim1_22.speaker: Mask of Regret
MaskedVictim1_22.text: You think Ethel was the only hag in the realms? Not by a long shot.
MaskedVictim1_22.context: NodeContext: grit and resolve on first phrase. Determination.

MaskedVictim1_4.speaker: Mask of Regret
MaskedVictim1_4.text: There's more hags out there - and I'm going to do what I can to make sure no one else has to go through what I did.

MaskedVictim1_7.speaker: Player
MaskedVictim1_7.text: You served her - give me one good reason to let you live.

MaskedVictim1_12.speaker: Mask of Regret
MaskedVictim1_12.text: It was the mask. It dug its roots into me... took away my will. I tried to fight it.
MaskedVictim1_12.context: NodeContext: explaining something she barely understands

MaskedVictim1_39.speaker: Mask of Regret
MaskedVictim1_39.context: NodeContext: like somebody responding to a medic after regaining consciousness

MaskedVictim1_15.speaker: Player
MaskedVictim1_15.text: You're lucky I didn't cut you down.

MaskedVictim1_5.speaker: Mask of Regret
MaskedVictim1_5.context: CinematicNodeContext: with a nodNodeContext: with a nod and exhalation, relief

MaskedVictim1_20.speaker: Mask of Regret
MaskedVictim1_20.text: We need to leave - she might not be dead. I don't even know if she can die.
MaskedVictim1_20.context: CinematicNodeContext: panicked, confused, as if coming out of a stuporNodeContext: confused, afraid

MaskedVictim1_21.speaker: Mask of Regret
MaskedVictim1_21.text: I'm feeling stronger by the minute. I'll be fine.
MaskedVictim1_21.context: NodeContext: still slightly shaken, but with resolve

MaskedVictim1_35.speaker: Mask of Regret
MaskedVictim1_35.text: Auntie only wants what's best for us.

HagLair_Victim_003_0.speaker: Lorin
HagLair_Victim_003_0.context: NodeContext: *With a gasp, the corpse shuddered.*

AD_ControlledByMask_0.speaker: Player
AD_ControlledByMask_0.text: Get out. GET OUT OF MY HEAD!
AD_ControlledByMask_0.context: CinematicNodeContext: Clutching head NodeContext: Panicked and afraid as the hag invades your mind. Lae'zel's line; Pa'vrylk = Stop! Pronounced; PAH-vrill-ck

AD_ControlledByMask_1.text: Quiet, little one. Auntie will make it all better.
AD_ControlledByMask_1.context: NodeContext: Soothing and cruel. A vicious insult as you take over their mind.

Lair_0.speaker: Mayrina
Lair_0.text: You wretched little insect. I'm going to rip out your spine!
Lair_0.context: NodeContext: Roaring it at the player - likely on the other side of the lair. They've freed your captive and you are furious and out of blood. Fit to kill everyone in the room.

Lair_7.text: You come to my home, interfere in my business, and now have the gall to face me in the heart of my lair? You petulant bollocks.
Lair_7.context: NodeContext: This begins the fight. Roaring it at the player - likely on the other side of the lair. They've freed your captive and you are furious and out of blood. Fit to kill everyone in the room.

Lair_6.text: I'll rip your spine out your arsehole.

Lair_1.text: I'll use your blood to spice my stew.

Lair_2.text: I'll keep you alive until I've sucked the marrow from your bones.

Lair_3.text: And then I'll bring you back and do it all over again.

Lair_4.speaker: Mayrina
Lair_4.text: Stop it! PLEASE. Let me go!
Lair_4.context: NodeContext: You're in a cage suspended above a height. You're absolutely terrified and crying out to the hag.

Lair_8.speaker: Mayrina
Lair_8.text: Just get out of here! Please!
Lair_8.context: NodeContext: You're in a cage suspended above a height. You're screaming at the player to get out of here. You're scared but determined.

MaskedVictim1_AD_Resist_0.speaker: Mask of Regret
MaskedVictim1_AD_Resist_0.context: NodeContext: in pain, resisting a telepathic command from the hag

MaskedVictim1_AD_Resist_1.speaker: Mask of Regret
MaskedVictim1_AD_Resist_1.context: NodeContext: in pain, resisting a telepathic command from the hag

MaskedVictim1_AD_Resist_2.speaker: Mask of Regret
MaskedVictim1_AD_Resist_2.context: NodeContext: in pain, resisting a telepathic command from the hag

MaskedVictim1_AD_Resist_3.speaker: Mask of Regret
MaskedVictim1_AD_Resist_3.context: NodeContext: in pain, resisting a telepathic command from the hag

MaskedVictim4_1.speaker: Mask of Terror
MaskedVictim4_1.context: NodeContext: as if drugged - hushed voice

MaskedVictim4_0.speaker: Mask of Terror
MaskedVictim4_0.text: Very droll, my friend. Most amusing.
MaskedVictim4_0.context: NodeContext:  a deranged but poltie butler

MaskedVictim4_7.speaker: Mask of Terror
MaskedVictim4_7.text: Oh dear - I forgot to plump her pillows this morning!
MaskedVictim4_7.context: NodeContext: overexaggerated concern - a deranged but poltie butler

MaskedVictim4_5.speaker: Mask of Terror
MaskedVictim4_5.text: Did something happen to auntie? I can't feel her anymore.
MaskedVictim4_5.context: NodeContext: confused as if drugged, halting

MaskedVictim4_6.speaker: Mask of Terror
MaskedVictim4_6.text: Are you here to see Auntie? Sorry the place is such a mess.
MaskedVictim4_6.context: NodeContext: curious, confused - brainwashed to serve the hag

MaskedVictim4_9.speaker: Mask of Terror
MaskedVictim4_9.text: You should leave. Auntie isn't receiving guests just now.
MaskedVictim4_9.context: NodeContext: quietly apologetic, and slightly deranged

AD_WearMask_0.text: Stop fighting me, petal. Let me take care of you.
AD_WearMask_0.context: NodeContext: You are attempting to break into someone's mind and take over from afar. Voice is low and seductive - enticing.

AD_WearMask_1.text: Haha! I Knew you'd bow. Knew you'd BREAK.
AD_WearMask_1.context: NodeContext: You've broken into someone's mind - and taken over. Victorious and cruel as you BEND THEM to your will.

AD_WearMask_2.text: YES. I've got you now, petal.
AD_WearMask_2.context: NodeContext: You've broken into someone's mind - and taken over. Victorious and cruel as you BEND THEM to your will.

AD_WearMask_3.text: You can't resist me, sweetness. Not forever.
AD_WearMask_3.context: NodeContext: You are attempting to break into someone's mind and take over from afar. Voice is low and seductive - enticing.

AD_WearMask_4.text: You'll break eventually, precious. They always do.
AD_WearMask_4.context: NodeContext: You are attempting to break into someone's mind and take over from afar. Voice is low and seductive - enticing.

AD_WearMask_5.text: Give in, sweet one. Serve your dear Auntie Ethel.
AD_WearMask_5.context: NodeContext: You are attempting to break into someone's mind and take over from afar. Voice is low and seductive - enticing.

AD_WearMask_6.context: NodeContext: You've broken into someone's mind - and taken over. Victorious and cruel as you BEND THEM to your will.

MaskedVictim1_AD_FailResist_0.speaker: Mask of Regret
MaskedVictim1_AD_FailResist_0.text: Yes, Auntie. I'll break their pretty little bones.
MaskedVictim1_AD_FailResist_0.context: NodeContext: Wearing a mask that controls her - at this point, it's commanded her to kill the player and she revels in what she's going to do

MaskedVictim2_AD_Resist_0.speaker: Mask of Servitude
MaskedVictim2_AD_Resist_0.context: NodeContext: in pain, trying to resist telepathic commands from the hag who is ordering them to kill the players in combat

MaskedVictim2_AD_Resist_1.speaker: Mask of Servitude
MaskedVictim2_AD_Resist_1.context: NodeContext: in pain, trying to resist telepathic commands from the hag who is ordering them to kill the players in combat

MaskedVictim2_AD_Resist_2.speaker: Mask of Servitude
MaskedVictim2_AD_Resist_2.context: NodeContext: in pain, trying to resist telepathic commands from the hag who is ordering them to kill the players in combat

MaskedVictim2_AD_Resist_3.speaker: Mask of Servitude
MaskedVictim2_AD_Resist_3.context: NodeContext: in pain, trying to resist telepathic commands from the hag who is ordering them to kill the players in combat

MaskedVictim2_0.speaker: Mask of Servitude
MaskedVictim2_0.text: Why is Auntie so quiet? I'm scared.

MaskedVictim2_8.speaker: Player
MaskedVictim2_8.text: Don't be afraid. I'm here to help - I need to remove the mask.

MaskedVictim2_7.speaker: Mask of Servitude
MaskedVictim2_7.text: There is no mask - leave me alone!
MaskedVictim2_7.context: NodeContext: confused and frightened, shouting in terror on last phrase - close to a panic attack

MaskedVictim2_1.speaker: Mask of Servitude
MaskedVictim2_1.text: Don't be afraid of Auntie - she'll take good care of you.
MaskedVictim2_1.context: NodeContext: halting speech, unsure if the statement is true but brainwashed to believe it is

MaskedVictim2_3.speaker: Mask of Servitude
MaskedVictim2_3.text: Don't touch me. Don't touch me!
MaskedVictim2_3.context: CinematicNodeContext: panicked state, warning us awayNodeContext: quiet on first phrase, then shouting - panicking, driven mad by the hag and afraid of everything

MaskedVictim2_10.speaker: Player
MaskedVictim2_10.text: I need to remove that mask.

MaskedVictim2_6.speaker: Player
MaskedVictim2_6.text: Don't panic - I'm here to help. The hag's dead.

MaskedVictim2_2.speaker: Mask of Servitude
MaskedVictim2_2.text: Auntie's dead? No no no no no.
MaskedVictim2_2.context: NodeContext: confused on first phrase, then quiet panic on the repetition of 'no' - close to a panic attack

MaskedVictim2_5.speaker: Mask of Servitude
MaskedVictim2_5.context: NodeContext: terrified, brainwashed to believe we want to harm them

MaskedVictim4_AD_Resist_0.speaker: Mask of Terror
MaskedVictim4_AD_Resist_0.context: NodeContext: in pain, trying to resist telepathic commands from the hag who is ordering them to kill the players in combat

MaskedVictim4_AD_Resist_1.speaker: Mask of Terror
MaskedVictim4_AD_Resist_1.text: Auntie... be kind to our guests.
MaskedVictim4_AD_Resist_1.context: NodeContext: in pain, trying to resist telepathic commands from the hag who is ordering them to kill the players in combat

MaskedVictim4_AD_Resist_2.speaker: Mask of Terror
MaskedVictim4_AD_Resist_2.context: NodeContext: in pain, trying to resist telepathic commands from the hag who is ordering them to kill the players in combat

MaskedVictim4_AD_Resist_3.speaker: Mask of Terror
MaskedVictim4_AD_Resist_3.context: NodeContext: in pain, trying to resist telepathic commands from the hag who is ordering them to kill the players in combat

MaskedVictim3_0.speaker: Mask of Vengeance
MaskedVictim3_0.text: They'll suffer - whoever hurt Auntie will suffer.

MaskedVictim3_6.speaker: Mask of Vengeance
MaskedVictim3_6.text: Somebody hurt Auntie - I'll open their veins.
MaskedVictim3_6.context: NodeContext: confused - mind almost completely lost - 'hurt' is past tense (ie 'somebody has hurt auntie')

MaskedVictim3_1.speaker: Player
MaskedVictim3_1.text: That mask is warping your mind - I need to remove it.

MaskedVictim3_3.speaker: Mask of Vengeance
MaskedVictim3_3.text: You can't take Auntie's gift! I won't let you!

MaskedVictim3_5.speaker: Player
MaskedVictim3_5.text: The hag's dead - you're free now.

MaskedVictim3_7.speaker: Mask of Vengeance
MaskedVictim3_7.text: Auntie will be awake soon. She'll be so angry.

MaskedVictim3_8.speaker: Mask of Vengeance
MaskedVictim3_8.text: If you hurt Auntie, I'll cut out your eyes.
MaskedVictim3_8.context: NodeContext: Sinister warning, but delivered by a brainwashed character - a little halting and confused

AD_PutOnMask_0.speaker: Player
AD_PutOnMask_0.context: NodeContext: Intrigued as you look around

AD_PutOnMask_1.text: Hello, petal. Just relax. Let me in.

MaskedVictim3_AD_Resist_0.speaker: Mask of Vengeance
MaskedVictim3_AD_Resist_0.context: NodeContext: in pain, trying to resist telepathic commands from the hag who is ordering them to kill the players in combat

MaskedVictim3_AD_Resist_1.speaker: Mask of Vengeance
MaskedVictim3_AD_Resist_1.context: NodeContext: in pain, trying to resist telepathic commands from the hag who is ordering them to kill the players in combat

MaskedVictim3_AD_Resist_2.speaker: Mask of Vengeance
MaskedVictim3_AD_Resist_2.text: The mask... I'm not the mask.
MaskedVictim3_AD_Resist_2.context: NodeContext: in pain, trying to resist telepathic commands from the hag who is ordering them to kill the players in combat

MaskedVictim3_AD_Resist_3.speaker: Mask of Vengeance
MaskedVictim3_AD_Resist_3.context: NodeContext: in pain, trying to resist telepathic commands from the hag who is ordering them to kill the players in combat
